title: Indexing Metadata Fragment
description: Tracks who added a record entry, how it was added, and the review status. Use stable slugs (e.g., added_by='assistant', method='manual', method='search_skill_mentions').

added_by.description: Tool or human responsible for adding this record (use consistent slugs such as 'assistant', 'human').

added_on.description: Date (YYYY-MM-DD) this entry was added to the dataset.

method.description: Workflow or tooling used to add this entry (e.g., 'manual', 'search_skill_mentions').

reviewed_by.description: Human who validated this entry, if any (null when pending).

review_status.description: Outcome of human review for this entry.

notes.description: Context or rationale for this addition (optional).
